articles.title: Jessica Alba Sees Nine-Figure Windfall as The Honest Company Goes Public - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: Jessica Alba earned an honest fortune Wednesday. The Honest Company went public Wednesday morning, raising $413 million in its IPO. The company, which trades on the Nasdaq under the ticker HNST, opened strong, with its stock price rising more than 40 percent …
